class.summary: This Class contains all of the logic which goes into making Composer work.

remark.para: The logic is abstracted away so that it can reused for both a console app, a winforms & eventually UWP.

constructor.name: Default
constructor.summary: The default constructor used to build an instance of Composer.

remark.para: This also initiatizes the file manager.

methods.name: Process
methods.summary: Is the central control loop which initiates all the actions.
methods.returns: If the cycles were successfully completed.

example.code: Compose composer = new Compose(); bool rc= composer.Process(ComposeData);

methods.name: SetStreams
methods.summary: Sets the path to the read & write files streams.
methods.returns: If the files/directories are successfully exist.

example.code: Compose composer = new Compose(); bool rc= composer.SetStreams(string, string);

methods.name: SetStreams
methods.summary: Sets the path to the all 3 files streams.
methods.returns: If all the streams are successfully set.

example.code: Compose composer = new Compose(); bool rc= composer.SetStreams(string, string, string);
